text: Bai Tian (born 27 September 1971 in Xi'an, Shaanxi) is a Chinese diplomat who served as the Ambassador of China to Malaysia from November 2017 to October 2020. Before his term ends in October 2020, he listed out three incomplete tasks which he hopes for his replacement's ability to complete, ranging from shooting of a film celebrating the China–Malaysia relations and friendship, establishing an international Chinese school to setting up an upscale Chinese tea house in Kuala Lumpur, capital of Malaysia. == References == Category:Living people Category:1971 births Category:Ambassadors of China to Malaysia Category:People from Xi'an
title: Bai Tian
